description: Test and Publish a resource that has been registered in the CloudFormation Registry.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:[0-9]{12}:type/.+  
Update requires: Replacement

PublicVersionNumber.description: The version number of a public third-party extension
PublicVersionNumber.markdownDescription:
The version number of a public third-party extension

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 5  
Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: Replacement

TypeName.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.
TypeName.markdownDescription:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}(::MODULE){0,1}  
Update requires: Replacement

LogDeliveryBucket.description: A url to the S3 bucket where logs for the testType run will be available
LogDeliveryBucket.markdownDescription:
A url to the S3 bucket where logs for the testType run will be available

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.markdownDescription:
The kind of extension

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: RESOURCE | MODULE | HOOK  
Update requires: Replacement

TypeVersionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension with the versionId.
TypeVersionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension with the versionId.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:[0-9]{12}:type/.+  
Update requires: No interruption

PublisherId.description: The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.
PublisherId.markdownDescription:
The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 40  
Pattern: [0-9a-zA-Z]{40}  
Update requires: No interruption

PublicTypeArn.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) assigned to the public extension upon publication
PublicTypeArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) assigned to the public extension upon publication

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/.+  
Update requires: No interruption
